Description: Blue glazed composition reis shabti with painted detail: a curled lappet-wig with black striations, black eyes and collar, one arm is held in relief against the chest and holds a black whip, the figure wears a garment with elbow-length sleeves and a triangular pleated apron, the separated feet rest on a plinth and have marked toes.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 53 [23].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
